title: I had no idea SHEIN sold PC parts…
description:
Get a free 14-day trial of Odoo’s all-in-one business solution and see how it can make your life easier! Check it out at https://www.odoo.com/r/5eLS

You know – and probably HATE – Shein. They’ve built a reputation for Low Quality Clothes and Questionable business practices. But they’ve become a 3rd party marketplace, like Aliexpress, Temu or Wish – and they now sell COMPUTER PARTS. But don’t buy them – or anything else from Shein for that matter. Watch the video and find out why.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1568099-i-had-no-idea-shein-sold-pc-parts%E2%80%A6/
